benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Retrieve payment custom fields

covered: Valid Request: Successful retrieval of custom fields for a valid paymentId (default NONE audit).
Audit parameter support: NONE, FULL, and MINIMAL audit levels are exercised (TC01–TC03; TC16).
Empty response handling: Empty array returned when no custom fields exist (TC04; TC19).
Non-data scenarios: System state variations including partially populated and empty databases (TC22; TC23).
Query parameters handling: Extra parameters ignored (TC05); invalid audit value (TC25); trailing spaces and special characters in paymentId rejected (TC20; TC21).
Error handling: Invalid paymentId formats and non-existent paymentId (TC06; TC07; TC13; TC14).
Service error handling: 503 Service Unavailable (TC10); 502 Dependency failure (TC17).
Performance and scale: Large dataset (TC11); response time (TC12); concurrency under load (TC24).
Retry logic: Retry after transient network failure (TC15).
Data consistency: New/updated custom field visibility after changes (TC18).
System state coverage: Partially populated database (TC23).
gaps: Pagination: No tests covering pagination handling for large datasets.
Caching behavior: No tests validating caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control).
Authorization: 403 Forbidden scenario not covered (only 401 tested).
Rate limiting: No tests for rate limiting/throttling (429).
recommendations: Add explicit pagination tests (page size, page navigation) to ensure proper behavior with large result sets.
Add tests validating caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) and consistency when data changes.
Add a 403 Forbidden authorization test to cover non-authenticated but authorized access rules.
Add rate limiting/throttling tests (e.g., 429) to ensure proper handling under high load.
